us.name: Lecto Translation
us.description: Fast Neural Translation. Text/HTML/JSON. Protected keys. Multiple source texts and target languages in a single request. Free Translation API trial with paid plans as low as $0.3 per million characters. 90+ supported languages. For personalized integration support or private plans with higher quotas, contact support@lecto.ai or via Telegram @lectoai . Also available via our website with attractive Translation API pricing at https://dashboard.lecto.ai/pricing
